parameters: Well, well, well... if it isn't the walking glitch.
I'm Zed. Welcome to The Squeaky Clean - where
That implant of yours is fascinating. I've never
seen anything like it. NeuraTech's work, but
I've been researching A.S.P. - that rogue AI that's
been causing trouble. I think I can create a device
that could temporarily disrupt its control systems.
But I need corporate research data from each of the
five MegaCorps. They all had a hand in creating
A.S.P., and their data could help me understand
Excellent! Each MegaCorp facility has terminals
with the data I need: NeuraTech, OmniCorp, Vitalix,
Be careful though - the facilities are heavily
guarded. You'll need to be stealthy or fight your
way through. Come back when you have the data.
Your loss. If you change your mind, I'll be here.
That implant of yours won't stay stable forever.
You got the corporate research data! Perfect.
I've done it! I've created an A.S.P. Disruptor.
This device can temporarily disrupt A.S.P.'s
control systems, giving you a window to act.
It's not perfect - it's a prototype. But it should
work in a pinch. Use it wisely - it's the only one
I can make with the materials I have.
Still working on getting that corporate data?
Remember, I need data from all five MegaCorps:
I've marked the locations on your map. The NeuraTech
facility is in Timbuc, OmniCorp and Vitalix are in
Timbuc 2, and Armatek and Quantum Dynamics are in
Each facility has a different security system. You'll
need to find a way to bypass them. Maybe look for
access codes or security keycards. Good luck!
The A.S.P. Disruptor should work against any
A.S.P.-controlled systems or entities. Use it
when you need to break through their defenses.
I've heard rumors about the Floating Mansion -
home of A.S.P.'s creator. You might want to
check it out. The Disruptor could be useful there.
Also, I've been working on something new. A device
that could potentially neutralize A.S.P. completely.
But I need more advanced components. If you find
any alien technology, bring it to me.
An Alien Artifact! This is exactly what I needed.
The technology in this is far beyond anything
we have on MegaEarth. Let me study it...
I've integrated the alien tech with the A.S.P.
Disruptor. It's now much more powerful. This
should be able to neutralize A.S.P. completely.
The enhanced A.S.P. Disruptor is ready. With this,
you should be able to confront A.S.P. directly.
I've heard that Dr. Eliza Voss, A.S.P.'s creator,
is being held prisoner in the Floating Mansion.
If you can free her, she might know how to shut
down A.S.P. permanently. The enhanced Disruptor
should help you get past the mansion's defenses.
Good luck. The fate of MegaEarth depends on you.
A high-tech operating table with various surgical
There are suspicious stains on the floor.
A computer terminal displaying various patient
Some of the designs look highly experimental.

events.name: Dr. Circuit
events.note: Cybernetic Enhancement Quest Line Starting NPC

parameters: *A person with visible cybernetic implants and a mechanical eye adjusts something under their skin with a small tool*
The corps sell watered-down implants with built-in obsolescence and monitoring. Pathetic.
I push the boundaries of what's possible. True integration of human and machine. No limits, no corporate leashes.
You look like someone who understands that the body is just hardware waiting to be upgraded. Interested in evolution?
Great! I'll mark the details of the Cybernetic Enhancement quest line in your neural log.
Come back when you've made progress on the first task.
I understand. Come back if you change your mind.

events.note: Cybernetic Enhancement Quest Line Starting NPC

parameters: *A person with visible cybernetic implants and a mechanical eye adjusts something under their skin with a small tool*

You look like someone who understands that the body is just hardware waiting to be upgraded. Interested in evolution?
Great! I'll mark the details of the Cybernetic Enhancement quest line in your neural log.

I understand. Come back if you change your mind.
*arm in a sling* Worth it. You should've seen the jump I cleared before the crash!
Nitro's organizing a Death Race soon. It's the ultimate test - racing through mutant territory at night.
I'll be back on the circuit as soon as Zed patches me up. You should join us if you've got a ride and a deathwish.

events.name: Wasteland Medic
events.note: Quest Helper NPC - healer - Mutant Pet Rescue

parameters: Heading to rescue mutant animals from that fighting ring? You'll need medical support.
I'll patch you up whenever you return here. No charge for animal rescuers.
Dr. Whiskers is doing important work. Glad to support the cause.

events.name: Cybernetic Tuner
events.note: Quest Helper NPC - buffer - Cybernetic Enhancement

parameters: Testing experimental enhancements for Dr. Circuit? Let me optimize your current implants.
This tuning will boost your system performance temporarily.
You've been granted System Optimization for 25 minutes!
All cybernetics need regular tuning. Come back anytime.

events.name: Cybernetic Installer
events.note: Quest Helper NPC - service_provider - Cybernetic Enhancement

parameters: Dr. Circuit sent you? I can install temporary experimental enhancements.
These mods will give you capabilities beyond standard implants, but they're not permanent.
Temporary Implants complete! This should help with your quest.
Perfect for testing before committing to permanent installation.
